title: Grave Robber

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a dead player. You rob their grave, gaining the Clothes of that role and 1 stress.
- During the day, choose to put on the Clothes of a role you robbed. You become that role for a single night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You return to being a Grave Robber at the start of each day.
- You do not consume Clothes.
